title: Beware the Taxman: Episode 268
description:
This episode of the UK True Crime podcast comes from Swansea, South Wales. We look at the murky and terribly sad world of addiction to hard drugs. In this story, a one mans desperation for money to buy drugs drives him to commit a terrible crime.....

1,Â  Please buy my book 'Gone Fishing' about the life and crimes of Angus Sinclair.
